system.description:
At 3rd level when you choose this archetype, you gain the following two Channel Divinity options:

Volcanic Fury

In response to witnessing an injustice or atrocity (or its after effects) you may use your reaction to erupt with righteous wrath. For the next hour, you have advantageous attack rolls and Intimidate checks against creatures involved in the triggering event, and your weapon attacks do an additional 1d6 fire damage to them. If you (with help from your companions) manage to slay all of the offending parties before the hour ends, you regain the spent use of channel divinity.

Lava Sculptor

As an action, you may create one of the following. Unless otherwise noted, it must be created in an empty space adjacent to you. Items created this way are permanent, but subject to natural forces. Lava cools and hardens into stone over the course of a day, etc.

  • A number of obsidian daggers equal to your proficiency bonus.

  • A crude raft made of pumice (large enough for you and two other creatures of medium size or smaller)

  • A 5-foot wide and 10-foot tall pillar of basalt. If created in your space, you are lifted by the pillar. Otherwise, it must be created on an empty space of solid ground.

  • A number of 5-foot squares of lava equal to your proficiency bonus.They need not all be adjacent to you, but they must each border at least one other square of lava (created by this ability or another source) along one side, and must be created across natural solid ground. If not connected to another lava source, the lava hardens into stone over the course of 24 hours.
